Judge EFFRON delivered the opinion of the Court.
A general court-martial composed of officer
and enlisted members convicted appellant, contrary to her pleas, of making
a false official statement and involuntary manslaughter, in violation of
Articles 107 and 119, Uniform Code of Military Justice, 10 USC §§
907 and 919. She was sentenced to confinement for 18 months, forfeiture
of all pay and allowances, and reduction to pay grade E-1. The convening
authority approved the sentence as adjudged and suspended the confinement
and forfeitures for a period of 1 year. The Court of Criminal Appeals affirmed.
52 M.J. 516 (N.M.Ct.Crim.App. 1999).
